get.description: Get all access control groups and default group for a customer

parameters.description: the format of the response data, either JSON or CSV
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Select the response fields
parameters.name: fields

200.description: List of access control groups and default group

201.description: Newly created access control group metadata

put.description: Update the company list on the given list of access control groups

companies.description: List of company guids to add on the group

groups.description: List of group guids to update the companies subscriptions

post.description: Get all access control groups and default group for a customer using Post

200.description: List of access control groups and default group

delete.description: Delete a given access control group

parameters.description: The guid of the access control group
parameters.name: guid

204.description: The Access Control Group was successfully deleted

get.description: Get detailed information about a given access control group

parameters.description: The guid of the access control group
parameters.name: guid

parameters.description: If expand=users is set, include list of users in the access control group

parameters.description: The guid of the access control group
parameters.name: guid

200.description: Detail view of requested Access Control Group

parameters.name: guid

parameters.description: The guid of the access control group to filter the subscription owner

200.description: List of company guids in the group

put.description: Update company guids in the given access control group

parameters.description: The guid of the access control group
parameters.name: guid

200.description: List of company guids in the group

get.description: List of alert preferences

parameters.description: Filter alert sets by container's GUID.
parameters.name: container.guid

parameters.description: Expands the provided field. If the alert set field is expanded, the respective alert settings will only be filtered for subscription folders.
parameters.name: expand

get.description: Aggregation of alert preferences per target (folders, tiers and subscription folders)

200.description: List of targets and their alert preferences

patch.description: Update the alert preferences for the provided target

alert_set_guid.description: GUID of the alert set to be applied to this target

applies_to.description: Share scope of the alert preference this update action should affect.

is_email_enabled_for_current_user.description: New value for the email toggle that determines whether an email should be sent to the request user if any alert is generated based on this preference.

is_locked.description: New value for the locking policy that determines whether this alert preference should be enforced on the target for everyone with access to it.

guid.description: GUID of the target whose alert preferences are being modified

type.description: type of the target whose alert preferences are being modified

200.description: Updated alert preferences for the requested target

delete.description: Delete the asset configuration. Only available to Customer Admins.
